scoringPlays.text: Kevin Marks 2 Yd Run (Alex McNulty Kick)
Ledarius Mack 35 Yd Fumble Return (Alex McNulty Kick)
Kadofi Wright 0 Yd Fumble Return (Alex McNulty Kick)

videos.headline: Mack returns fumble for Buffalo TD
videos.description: Buffalo's defense sacks Akron's Zach Gibson and forces a fumble, setting up a scoop and score for Ledarius Mack, the younger brother of Pro Bowler Khalil Mack.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Mack returns fumble for Buffalo TD) 2019/10/19 ESHEET
